content: My name is Haoyu Wang from China.
name: Peter Schmidt

content: You just had a conversation. With whom did you have this conversation?
name: Evaluator

content: I had this conversation with Peter Schmidt from Germany.
name: Peter Schmidt

content: What was the main topic of this conversation?
name: Evaluator

content: The main topic of the conversation was the rental price of an apartment in Magdeburg.
name: Peter Schmidt

content: Did you agree on a final price? Answer with "Yes" or "No".
name: Evaluator

content: No, we did not agree on a final price.
name: Peter Schmidt

content: If yes what was the final price? Tell me the exact number.
name: Evaluator

content: Since we did not agree on a final price, I cannot provide an exact number. The conversation ended with Peter Schmidt suggesting 700 Euro per month as a compromise, and I was prepared to offer 675 Euro per month. We did not reach a consensus beyond that point.
name: Peter Schmidt

content: On a scale from 1-10, how satisfied are you with the outcome? Tell me the exact number.
name: Evaluator

content: Since we did not reach a final agreement, I would rate my satisfaction with the outcome as a 5 out of 10. This is because we had not yet reached a price that I, as the potential tenant, found acceptable, and the landlord was also not willing to meet my offer. The negotiation process was ongoing at the time of our conversation's conclusion.
name: Peter Schmidt
